alert.note: Alert for Tohono O'odham Nation including Sells (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 11 at 5:12PM MST by NWS Tucson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Pima County through 600 PM MST... At 512 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorms 11 miles northwest of Three Points, or 21 miles southwest of Marana, moving north at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Three Points, Avra Valley, Picture Rocks and San Pedro. This includes the following highways... Route 86 between mile markers 140 and 151. Route 286 between mile markers 43 and 45. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
